title: FxBox.io

comments.author: Markperop
comments.body: Last year NFT became very popular, there were many investors in the market, almost everyone wanted to buy NFT.¬† I wonder how things will be this year?¬† We need to monitor the development of the FxBox platform and wait for an announcement from the team about the listing of the fxb token on Binance.¬† I hope this event will take place in the near future.

comments.author: yawars20
comments.body: So both Forex trading and The play2earn games, NFTs etc can be done on a single app? Or we have to install different versions of apps to use multiple feature. Also NFTs are limited to FxBox platform or can be transfer outside with value?

comments.author: Spaffin
comments.body: Can the platform make Forex trading easier for beginners by providing analysis tools?¬† As you know, Fundamental Analysis is the most natural way to predict the behavior of the Forex market.¬† In theory, only it is enough, but in practice it is often used in conjunction with technical analysis.¬† What does the team offer in this regard?

comments.author: Revvo1
comments.body: What is The API of FXB/USDC token pairs farming reward? any minimum criteria to invest?

comments.author: FxBox.io
comments.body: Quote from: yawars20 on December 06, 2023, 11:54:44 PMSo both Forex trading and The play2earn games, NFTs etc can be done on a single app? Or we have to install different versions of apps to use multiple feature. Also NFTs are limited to FxBox platform or can be transfer outside with value? different versions Crypto (Investing NFT, Marketplace, Lottery ) and Forex (only trading USD and FTX accounts). Yes NFTs are limited to FxBox platform

comments.author: FxBox.io
comments.body: Quote from: Spaffin on December 07, 2023, 07:31:50 AMCan the platform make Forex trading easier for beginners by providing analysis tools?¬† As you know, Fundamental Analysis is the most natural way to predict the behavior of the Forex market.¬† In theory, only it is enough, but in practice it is often used in conjunction with technical analysis.¬† What does the team offer in this regard?Yes. the platform has everything and technical and fundamental analysis. The Basic version is launched now and the Pro version (MetaTrader 5) will be launched in the future.

comments.author: FxBox.io
comments.body: Quote from: Revvo1 on December 07, 2023, 07:28:13 PMWhat is The API of FXB/USDC token pairs farming reward? any minimum criteria to invest?Farming is staking LP pairs FXB/BNB and FXB/USDT (pancake V2) and after that points are accrued for which you can get NFTs.Staking NFTs you get 18,000,000 $FXB tokens will be distributed every day to all NFT holders. Buying Lucky Box a card staking automatic.

You can make a deposit in Pancake pools FXB/BNB or FXB/USDT and earn points, which you can exchange for NFTs.‚óè They are needed for summoning, and you will be able to create new NFTs for the game.‚óè You can open an account on our trading platforms and start Forex trading.‚óè You can buy lottery tickets and stand a chance to win significant prizes in our lotteries.‚óè You can play Oracle, where you simply predict whether the exchange rate will be higher or lower in a few minutes.‚óè You can use it in all financial games that we will create in the future."[/size]#nft #NFTsale #P2E #investing #trading #forex #Staking #Mining #lottery #LOTTO #lottofriday #bettig #GameFi #bsc #defi #NFTs #forextrading #farming #Binance #mobox

comments.body: FxBox is a good project, They have a good team behind this projects.FxBox Group community is active and very communicative.Hopefully it will be potential coins for investment at the coming years.Let's invest and support FxBox...

comments.body: I tried to make very good video content in order to participate in the Lucky Boxes giveaway. I was lucky and won Lucky Boxes in the Video campaign.
